questions.question: The speed of a wave through a metal rod depends on

answers.a: Density of the material of the rod
answers.b: Young’s modulus of the material of the rod
answers.d: Both density and Young's modulus of the material of the rod

explanations.c: Incorrect. Speed is independent of total mass.

questions.question: The standard unit of sound wave velocity

explanations.a: Correct. Velocity is measured in meters per second.
explanations.b: This is the unit of acceleration.
explanations.c: This is the unit of frequency.

questions.question: When a wave passes through a medium, its particles vibrate. How often does a particle vibrate per second is referred to as its

explanations.a: Correct. Frequency is the number of vibrations per second.
explanations.b: Period is the time for one vibration, not how often.
explanations.c: Wavelength is the spatial distance between wave points.
